title: the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022) shall come into
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 

(Part 9) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited birth information tracing act 2022 (part 9) (commencement) order 2022

title: the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022) shall come into
heading: 2. The 3rd day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 9 of
text_raw:
2. The 3rd day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which Part 9 of 
the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 September 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [496] 3

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order commences Part 9 of the Birth Information and Tracing Act
text_norm: explanatory note (this note part instrument purport legal interpretation.) order commences part 9 birth information tracing act

title: the Birth Information and Tracing Act 2022 (No. 14 of 2022) shall come into
heading: 2022. Part 9 amends the Civil Registration Act 2004 (as amended).
text_raw:
